sources.title: The Brothers O'Toole (1973)
sources.description: The O'Toole Brothers are Eastern con men, exceptionally good at talking their way out of tight situations. When they ride into Molybdenum, Colorado, not suspecting the riches beneath the streets, they turn the sleepy mining town upside-down for their search for the gold. High-spirited hijinks ensue, with the brothers involved in everything from stolen gambling equipment to a "belchin', cussin' and spittin' " contest. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-brothers-otoole-1973/

metadata.Plot: The brothers, a couple of ne'er-do-wells, turn a sleepy mining town upside-down in their search for quick riches.
metadata.Actors: John Astin, Pat Carroll, Hans Conried
